content.title: USERS A-Z
content.text: To find users alphabetically by user name, use the a-z button bar on top.

content.title: EMAIL SELECTED USERS
content.text: To email only the selected users, first select users in the gridview by clicking on the checkboxes on the left side. Fill in the "Subject" and "From" fields, type your message or copy and paste your html and click on the "Send Email" button.

content.title: EMAIL ALL USERS
content.text: To email all registered users, follow the procedure above and click the "Send To All" button.

content.title: EMAIL A ROLE GROUP
content.text: To email all registered users in a role group, follow the procedure above and then from the "Send To Role" drop down list select the desired role.

content.title: EDIT USER INFO
content.text: To edit user info like roles and email address, simply click on the user name to display the selected user's account information on a modal dialogue.

content.title: WYSIWYG EDITOR
content.text: To take advantage of the built in text editor / word processor, click on the gray bar on top of the text field to reveal the available options.

content.title: HTML VS PLAIN TEXT
content.text: If you wish send email in html format, you don't have to do anything as the html radio button is selected by default.

content.title: EMAIL PRIORITY
content.text: To set the email priority, simply select the appropriate radio button: high, default, or low.
